title: EXCLUSIVE: Facebook user terms change limits EU data law effect
text:
EXCLUSIVE: Facebook user terms change limits EU data law effect   01:55 
Facebook is about to change its Terms of Service for 1.5 billion international users to move their jurisdiction out of Ireland and to the U.S. ahead of the launch of a strict new data protection law by the European Union.   
Facebook is about to change its Terms of Service for 1.5 billion international users to move their jurisdiction out of Ireland and to the U.S. ahead of the launch of a strict new data protection law by the European Union.  //reut.rs/2HLK3ZY
